Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] Advanced Projects at the Quality and Usability Lab, QU, VL+UE

Messages.Author: Daniel Juan Sivizaca Conde
Messages.Content: Dear participants of the student projects,  here is a short reminder to register for one of the three courses in MTS by tomorrow (26.04.2024) at the latest.  You can now also find the current POS numbers in ISIS.  I wish you all a good project start.  Best regards Daniel Conde _________________________________________________________  Interdisciplinary Media Project (10 LP), POS number: 40054  Study Project Quality & Usability (9 CP), POS number: 40726  Study project Quality & Usability (6 CP), POS number: 40725

Messages.Author: Daniel Juan Sivizaca Conde
Messages.Content: Hello everyone, The assignment for the student projects is done. You will find the participant lists in the respective project sections and you have been registered in subgroups in ISIS. This means that you can communicate directly with your project supervisor and the other project members. The next step for you is to take part in the respective project introduction sessions. Please don't forget to register in MOSES/MTS by 26.04.2024. I wish you all much success with your projects Daniel Conde
